events.message: The candidate John Smith has submitted his application for the Software Engineer position, highlighting experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
John Smith's application has been categorized under Engineering due to his software development skills and experience with DevOps tools.
Recruiter Emily Johnson has been assigned to manage John's candidacy and coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
Emily conducted an initial screening with John, who demonstrated strong knowledge in software architecture and automation techniques.
John responded promptly to the screening follow-up questions and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward with the technical interview phase.
The technical interview has been scheduled for John on May 6th at 2 PM UTC, focusing on system design and coding challenges.
